Getting better  Getting worse  Flat

越来越好 越来越差 平坦

Internal disorder is a moderate risk. Wealth, income, and values gaps are typical. Regarding inequality, the top 1 percent and top 10 percent in Spain capture 12 percent and 34 percent of income (respectively the seventh and eighth highest shares across major countries). Our internal conflict gauge is average. This gauge measures actual conflict events (e.g., protests), political conflict (e.g., partisanship), and general discontent (based on surveys).

内部混乱是一种中等程度的风险。财富、收入和价值观的差距是典型的。在不平等方面，西班牙收入最高的 1% 和最高的 10% 的人占有 12% 和 34% 的收入（分别是主要国家中第七和第八高的份额）。我们的内部冲突指标是平均的。这个指标衡量实际的冲突事件（如抗议）、政治冲突（如党派）和普遍的不满（基于调查）。

Looking in more detail at the eight key measures of power, we would call out its relative unimportance to global trade and its bad reading on innovation and technology. Spain accounts for just 2 percent of global exports. With innovation and technology, small shares of global patent applications (less than 1 percent), global R&D spending (1 percent), and global researchers (1 percent) are in Spain.

更详细地看一下八个关键的权力衡量标准，我们要指出它对全球贸易的相对不重要，以及它在创新和技术方面的糟糕表现。西班牙仅占全球出口的 2%。在创新和技术方面，西班牙在全球专利申请（不到 1%）、全球研发支出（1%）和全球研究人员（1%）中的份额很小。

More from the Author

作者的更多信息

Principles

原则

ABOUT THE AUTHOR

关于作者

Ray Dalio has been a global macro investor for nearly 50 years. He is the founder and co-CIO of Bridgewater Associates, an industry-leading institutional investment firm that is the largest hedge fund in the world.

雷·达利奥从事全球宏观投资近 50 年了。他是桥水公司的创始人和联合首席执行官，桥水公司是一家行业领先的机构投资公司，是世界上最大的对冲基金。

Dalio grew up a very ordinary middle-class kid on Long Island, started investing when he was 12 years old, created Bridgewater out of his two-bedroom apartment when he was 26, and grew it into what Fortune assessed to be the fifth most important private company in the US. In the process, he became an advisor to top policy makers, which led TIME to name him one of the “100 Most Influential People in the World.” CIO and Wired have called him “the Steve Jobs of investing” for his uniquely inventive and industry-changing way of thinking. He has also been named by Forbes as one of the 50 most generous philanthropists in the US.

达利奥在长岛一个非常普通的中产阶级孩子身上长大，12 岁时开始投资，26 岁时在他的两居室公寓里创建了桥水公司，并将其发展成为《财富》杂志评估的美国第五大私人公司。在这个过程中，他成为最高决策者的顾问，这使《时代》周刊将他评为 “世界上最有影响力的 100 人” 之一。CIO和《连线》杂志称他为 “投资界的史蒂夫·乔布斯”，因为他具有独特的创造性和改变行业的思维方式。他还被《福布斯》评为美国 50 位最慷慨的慈善家之一。

In 2017, he decided to pass along the principles behind his success in a series of books and animated videos. His book Principles: Life and Work was a No. 1 New York Times Best Seller and No. 1 Amazon business book of the year, has sold more than 3 million copies worldwide, and has been translated into over 30 languages. His 30-minute animated YouTube videos “How the Economic Machine Works” and “Principles for Success” have together been watched more than 100 million times, and his book Principles for Navigating Big Debt Crise s was well-received by economists, policy makers, and investors.

2017 年，他决定在一系列书籍和动画视频中传授他成功背后的原则。他的书《原则》。生活与工作》是《纽约时报》最佳畅销书第一名和亚马逊年度商业书籍第一名，在全球已售出 300 多万册，并被翻译成 30 多种语言。他的 30 分钟 YouTube 动画视频 “经济机器如何运作” 和 “成功的原则” 总共被观看了 1 亿多次，他的《驾驭大债务危机的原则》一书受到经济学家、政策制定者和投资者的好评。

In this new book, Principles for Dealing with the Changing World Order, Dalio applies his unique way of seeing the world to studying the rises and falls of great reserve currency empires. His hope is that the model shared in these pages will help readers prepare for the changing times ahead.

在这本新书《处理不断变化的世界秩序的原则》中，达利欧将他看待世界的独特方式用于研究伟大的储备货币帝国的兴衰。他希望在这些页面中分享的模式将帮助读者为未来的变化时代做好准备。

GLOSSARY OF TERMS

术语表

Countries

国家

ARG
Argentina
BEL
Belgium
BRZ
Brazil
CAN
Canada
CHE
Switzerland
CHI
Chile
CHN
China
COL
Colombia
CZK
Czech Republic
DEU
Germany
ESP
Spain
EUR
Euroland
FRA
France
GBR (or UK)
United Kingdom
GRC
Greece
HUN
Hungary
IDR
Indonesia
IND
India
ITA
Italy
JPN
Japan
MEX
Mexico
NLD
Netherlands
NOR
Norway
PLD
Poland
PRT
Portugal
RUS
Russia
SAF
South Africa
SGP
Singapore
SWE
Sweden
TLD
Thailand
TUR
Turkey
USA (or US)
United States
WLD
World

Terms

条款

Adj
Adjusted
Ann
Annualized
Avg
Average
Bln
Billion
CB
Central bank
Chg
Change
Corp
Corporate
CPI
Consumer price index
Dutch EIC
Dutch East India Company
Est
Estimate
FX (or Spot FX)
Currency exchange rate
GDP
Gross domestic product
Govt
Government
Intl
International
Inv
Inverted
Log
Natural log
MA
Moving average
Mln
Million
Oz
Ounces
Pop
Population
PPM
Parts per million
PPP
Purchasing power parity
RGDP
Real (inflation-adjusted) gross domestic product
TWI
Trade-weighted index
Y (or Yr)
Year
Y/Y
Year-over-year change
$
US dollars
£
British pounds
12mma
12-month moving average
60/40
Refers to a portfolio of 60 percent equities and 40 percent bonds
6mma
6-month moving average

Currencies

货币

CNY
Chinese yuan
GBP
British pound sterling
Guilder
Dutch currency
Maravedi Coin
Spanish coin of 12th–19th centuries
USD
US dollar

For definitions of commonly used economic terms, please see economicprinciples.org

关于常用经济术语的定义，请参见economicprinciples.org。
